name: Zero Rez HZ1
description:
This is a prototype game that plays best in Firefox.  Please leave a comment below on what you think and if you would like to be able to play more.  Thanks!

Controls:

Left: Left, A

Up: Up, W

Right: Right, D

Down: Down, S

Action: Enter, Left Click

Menu: Esc

Use Item: LCtrl, Left Click

Next Item: X

Prev Item: Z

Next Member: E

Prev Member: Q

Use Magic: Space

Jump: LShift
